| HistoryText             =  The Garrison is one of the superhero teams from the [[50-State Initiative (Earth-616)|50-State Initiative]] and their base of operations is Vermont. The Garrison's first mission was to apprehend the Thunderbolt member known as [[Robert Baldwin (Earth-616)|Penance]].

However, they were soundly defeated and Penance continued on his way.
